page.title: 08Recreation
page.content:
Facilities for sport are available in the nearby towns, Longridge and Clitheroe sharing a sports centre and swimming pool with special transport on Saturdays linking the two.
Knowle Green and Thornley hold regular W.I. meetings and the N.F.U. and Y.F.C. have many members within the area. Chipping and Ribchester have amateur theatrical societies, both very popular. Regular Whist and Domino drives take place at Knowle Green and Thornley. Longridge Cricket Club, Hockey Club and Golf Club all lie within the area but draw members from farther afield. The old quarries provide a fishing lake and three caravan sites. There is shooting at Thornley one shoot belongs to a syndicate, one to a local farmer.
